Name: Bring Low
Description: If the Bear is awake, deal 2 damage to one enemy.

Name: Roll Over
Description:
If the Bear is awake, deal 2 damage to one enemy and subdue it.
Otherwise, rotate up to two hero cards on your field.

Name: Mark Territory
Description: Rotate two hero cards on your field.

Name: Finish Off
Description: Deal 4 damage to an enemy with 4 health remaining.

Name: Roar
Description:
If the Bear is awake, deal 3 damage to one enemy.
Otherwise, blank one encounter card until tomorrow.

Name: Bear Down
Description:
If the Bear is awake, deal 6 damage to one enemy.
Otherwise, remove 6 ⏳.
